mainHero.title: Automate your rental business:
mainHero.subtitle: Reduce Costs, Maximize Occupancy
mainHero.description: UrbanIQ automates property management and coliving operations, allowing managers to scale effortlessly while improving tenant satisfaction. We combine AI, IoT, and an integrated marketplace to optimize operations and maximize revenue.

secondaryAction.href: mailto:urbaniq.work@gmail.com?subject=How do I maximize my revenue with UrbanIQ?

product.title: Transforming Coliving Management with AI-Powered Solutions

items.title: Held back by manual operations?
items.description: In today’s competitive real estate market, property managers spend too much time on manual, inefficient processes—leading to missed revenue, lost tenants, and increased operating costs. Without automated systems, scaling operations becomes difficult and profitability suffers.

items.title: Automate Coliving Management
items.description: UrbanIQ is an intelligent property management platform that integrates AI-powered pricing, self-check-ins, tenant communications, and IoT automation to eliminate inefficiencies. Property managers can increase operational efficiency, reduce costs, and scale effortlessly with our centralized, scalable platform.

features.title: Why UrbanIQ?
features.subtitle: UrbanIQ automates manual processes like check-ins, pricing, and tenant communications
features.description: Built specifically for the rapidly growing coliving and short-term rental market. UrbanIQ helps property managers automate 80% of their operations, leading to a 40% improvement in efficiency and a 60% revenue boost, based on early customer results.

items.name: AI-Powered Pricing Automation
items.description: Automatically adjust pricing based on demand, seasonality, and market trends, maximizing revenue for property managers.

items.name: Seamless Self-Check-In & IoT Integration
items.description: Streamline tenant check-ins and facility access with integrated IoT devices, reducing the need for manual processes.

items.name: Tenant Communication Automation
items.description: Automatically respond to tenant inquiries through AI-powered chatbots, improving customer satisfaction while reducing administrative workload.

items.name: Marketplace for Custom Solutions
items.description: Access a marketplace of third-party apps and services, allowing property managers to customize and enhance their operations.

sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
